00027 #ifndef CFP_ERROR_H
00028 #define CFP_ERROR_H
00029 
00030 #include <exception>
00031 #include <string>
00032 
00033 namespace cfp
00034 {
00035 
00037         class Error: public std::exception
00038         {
00039         public:
00046                 explicit
00047                 Error(size_t start, size_t length);
00048 
00051                 virtual 
00052                 ~Error(void) throw();
00053 
00059                 virtual const char*
00060                 what(void) const throw();
00061 
00067                 virtual const std::string&
00068                 whatStr(void) const throw();
00069 
00079                 virtual const char*
00080                 what(size_t& start, size_t& length) const throw();
00081 
00091                 virtual const std::string&
00092                 whatStr(size_t& start, size_t& length) const throw();
00093 
00094         protected:
00102                 explicit
00103                 Error(const std::string& msg, size_t start, size_t length);
00104 
00109                 void setMessage(const std::string& msg);
00110 
00111         private:
00112                 std::string msg_m;    
00113                 size_t      start_m;  
00114                 size_t      length_m; 
00115         };
00116 
00117 
00119         class ErrorInvalidChar: public Error
00120         {
00121         public:
00122                 explicit ErrorInvalidChar(size_t start, size_t length)
00123                         : Error("Invalid Character !", 
00124                                 start, length)
00125                 {}
00126         };
00127 
00129         class ErrorSymBegLowChar: public Error
00130         {
00131         public:
00132                 explicit ErrorSymBegLowChar(size_t start, size_t length)
00133                         : Error("Symbols must not begin with lower case characters !", 
00134                                 start, length)
00135                 {}
00136         };
00137 
00142         class ErrorDecimBetwInt: public Error
00143         {
00144         public:
00145                 explicit ErrorDecimBetwInt(size_t start, size_t length)
00146                         : Error("Decimal operator only between numerical characters allowed !",
00147                                 start, length)
00148                 {}
00149         };
00150 
00151 
00153         class ErrorMaxNesting: public Error
00154         {
00155         public:
00156                 explicit ErrorMaxNesting(size_t start, size_t length)
00157                         : Error("Maximum nesting level reached !",
00158                                 start, length)
00159                 {}
00160         };
00161 
00162 
00164         class ErrorStartWithCoef: public Error
00165         {
00166         public:
00167                 explicit ErrorStartWithCoef(size_t start, size_t length)
00168                         : Error("Expression must not begin with floating point value !",
00169                                 start, length)
00170                 {}
00171         };
00172 
00173 
00177         class ErrorLoneNucleonNum: public Error
00178         {
00179         public:
00180                 explicit ErrorLoneNucleonNum(size_t start, size_t length)
00181                         : Error("Nucleon number specified without preceding Element symbol !",
00182                                 start, length)
00183                 {}
00184         };
00185 
00186 
00188         class ErrorLoneClosingBracket: public Error
00189         {
00190         public:
00191                 explicit ErrorLoneClosingBracket(size_t start, size_t length)
00192                         : Error("Encountered closing bracket without preceding opening bracket !", 
00193                                 start, length)
00194                 {}
00195         };
00196 
00197 
00199         class ErrorMissingClosingBracket: public Error
00200         {
00201         public:
00202                 explicit ErrorMissingClosingBracket(size_t start, size_t length)
00203                         : Error("Missing closing bracket !", 
00204                                 start, length)
00205                 {}
